General.Name: UGE International Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: UGE International Ltd. develops, builds, finances, owns, and operates commercial and community solar facilities in Canada, the United States, and the Philippines. It also provides energy storage services; and engineering and consulting services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 56 Temperance Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3V5
